Layout/EmptyLineBetweenDefs.description:
Description

Use empty lines between class/module/method defs.
Layout/EmptyLineBetweenDefs.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EmptyLineBetweenMethodDefs: True (type: bool)
EmptyLineBetweenClassDefs: True (type: bool)
EmptyLineBetweenModuleDefs: True (type: bool)
DefLikeMacros: [] (type: list)
AllowAdjacentOneLineDefs: True (type: bool)
NumberOfEmptyLines: 1 (type: int)
